definition: personnel/human resources/human affairs/ways of the world/(euphemism) sexuality/the facts of life

sentences.english: I know him quite well, and there are wheels within wheels.
sentences.chinese: 我很了解他，那里的人事关系很复杂。

sentences.english: R︰Hold on, Iwill pass you to the human resource department.
sentences.chinese: 等一下，我把您传到人事部。

sentences.english: Through the analysis of personnel, indicating the Way of Heaven not be trusted.
sentences.chinese: 通过对人事的分析，说明天道不可信。

sentences.english: Then, give you units of the Personnel Section on the.
sentences.chinese: 我是本公司的人事科助理经理。

sentences.english: The man ran toward the emperor before falling unconscious to the ground, where he lay groaning.
sentences.chinese: 他径直向皇帝跑来，但终于不省人事跌倒了。

sentences.english: Combined with the well-known institutions, the Department of labor and personnel departments cooperation in running schools.
sentences.chinese: 联合各知名院校，各劳动部门和人事部门合作办学。

sentences.english: I have been in the business for the last ten years， and worked as the superintendent in the personnel department。
sentences.chinese: 本人在过去十年在商界担任人事部主任迄今。

sentences.english: Therefore, we have designed this "the personnel management system".
sentences.chinese: 因此，我们设计了这个“人事管理系统”。

sentences.english: K. C. is a Fellow of the Chartered Institute of Personnel and Development.
sentences.chinese: 是英国特许人事和发展学会的成员。

sentences.english: I'd like to speak to someone in the personnel department.
sentences.chinese: 工作安排是这个单位人事处的主要任务。

sentences.english: Post setting and salary system are the core of the reform of the personnel system.
sentences.chinese: 高校岗位设置和薪酬体系是高校人事制度改革的核心。

sentences.english: Our personnel manager will be in the office tomorrow. Would you like to come tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 我们的人事部经理明天会在办公室，您要明天来吗？

sentences.english: That person  personally  persuaded the personnel with persuasive words.
sentences.chinese: 那个人用有说服力的话亲自说服了人事部门。

sentences.english: Improved management of the cadre and personnel files of the rules and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 完善了有关干部人事档案管理的各项规章制度。

sentences.english: to guide the reform of personnel systems of the directly affiliated institutions.
sentences.chinese: 指导直属单位人事制度改革。

sentences.english: As for the Dao of governance, both of them take the idea that human conducts should be in conformity with the Dao of heaven.
sentences.chinese: 在治道观上，两者均取推天道以明人事的思维取象。

definition: affairs of life/things of the world
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
(political, economic etc) affairs/work/transaction (as in a computer database)
to be put in charge of/to be responsible for/branched passage
